privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy for jomfood.my
privacyPolicy.introduction:
Welcome to jomfood.my ("we", "our", "us"). We value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard information when you visit our website jomfood.my, which provides listings, promotions, and deals related to restaurants across Malaysia.

By accessing or using our website, you agree to the terms outlined in this Privacy Policy.
privacyPolicy.personalInformationDesc: Information you provide voluntarily, such as:
privacyPolicy.usageDataDesc: Automatically collected when you browse our platform:
privacyPolicy.thirdPartyDataDesc: If you engage with external restaurant partners, delivery services, or promo providers through our website, they may share limited information with us to process your request.
privacyPolicy.use1: To operate and maintain the jomfood.my website
privacyPolicy.use2: To improve user experience and website performance
privacyPolicy.use3: To send newsletters, promotions, alerts, or deal updates
privacyPolicy.use4: To personalize content, recommendations, and restaurant deals
privacyPolicy.use5: To communicate with you regarding support or inquiries
privacyPolicy.use6: To prevent fraudulent activities and enhance security
privacyPolicy.use7: To comply with legal or regulatory requirements
privacyPolicy.cookiesDesc: We use cookies, web beacons, and analytics tools to:
privacyPolicy.cookiesNote: You may disable cookies in your browser settings, but certain site features may not work properly.

We do not sell your personal information.
We may share your data only with:

privacyPolicy.legalComplianceDesc: We may disclose information if required:
privacyPolicy.legal1: By law, regulation, or court order
privacyPolicy.legal2: To protect our rights, security, and users
privacyPolicy.securityDesc: We implement industry-standard security measures, including:
privacyPolicy.securityNote: While we strive to protect your data, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure.
privacyPolicy.rightsDesc: Depending on Malaysian privacy laws, you may:
privacyPolicy.right1: Request access to your personal data
privacyPolicy.right3: Request deletion of your account or information
privacyPolicy.rightsContact: To exercise your rights, contact us at: info@jomfood.my
privacyPolicy.contactDescription: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:
privacyPolicy.thirdPartyLinksNote: We are not responsible for the privacy practices of external sites. Please review their policies separately.
privacyPolicy.childrenDesc:
jomfood.my does not knowingly collect information from children under the age of 13.
If such data is unknowingly collected, we will delete it promptly upon discovery.
privacyPolicy.changesDesc:
We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time.
Any changes will be posted on this page with a revised Last Updated date.
